item.title: Defensive Theology Resources
item.description: An open letter to our fellow Christians who are anti-LGBTQ+ # Scripture on sexuality # Scripture on gender (wip) # A book focused on sexuality # Matthew Vines makes a compelling case for biblically-grounded responses to such questions as: How could traditional beliefs have been wrong for thousands of years on such an important topic? What is the story of Sodom and Gomorrah really saying about human relationships?

item.title: Queer Theology Reading List

The History of Sexuality, Volume 1. (you can read this online / download as pdf here) Jay Emerson Johnson. Peculiar Faith: Queer Theology for Christian Witness. New York, NY: Seabury Books, 2014. Dale B. Martin. Sex and the Single Savior: Gender and Sexuality in Biblical Interpretation.
